title: FOR STARTUPS
content: Over 70 startups have put our trust in us for helping them hire the most creative talent in the industry. Should you too?

infoBannerOne.contentText: With a pan-india talent pool, we promise to help you find a hungry creator looking for a canvas. From Graphics Desginers to Content Writers to Growth Marketers. If it has to do with content, you’d find a hungry creator in our community.

infoBannerTwo.contentText: We understand that hiring is a tough and crucial decision for any startup. We also understand that not every match we make is going to be perfect. That is why we’d like to offer your startup a free replacement for an intern incase of a mismatch.

infoBannerThree.contentText: We expect you to lay back and drink a nice cup of Chai ☕ once we have the details in place. We don’t throw a million resumes at you, we share with you the top match and streamline the process for everyone.
